duties_responsibilities.duty: Coordinate inbound and outbound freight shipments and deliveries, dispatch drivers, and determine drive routes to meet deadlines.
Interact with drivers to coordinate pickups at customer sites and SCS service centers.
Provide alerts of changing weather and traffic conditions, and relay changes to customer delivery and pickup information.
Utilize the Freight Forwarding system to update freight shipment and customer pickup and delivery information, and track driver mileage and fuel usage.
Perform freight reweights and ensure correct rate calculations to recover revenue.
Assist in mentoring and providing guidance to lower-level Center Freight Operations Specialist.
Responsible for administrative work such as data entry, tracking and tracing, rate quotes, and other operational customer service items.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Logistics, Supply Chain Management, or a related field (Master's preferred)
